resources.string:
" This is a protected folder that is not accessible with standard file managers on unrooted phones.
However, if your phone is rooted it can be accessed using our privileged mode file manager which is called Root Explorer.
Please click on the button below to view Root Explorer in the market."
The data folder contains data stored by system and third-party apps as well as the installed apps themselves.

"Your phone doesn't appear to be rooted. This is required in order to gain access to protected files and folders such as this.
The easiest way to find out how to root your phone is to Google \"root your_phone_name\" and look through the results for an appropriate tutorial."

"Your phone doesn't appear to be rooted. This is required in order to change or delete protected files such as this.
The easiest way to find out how to root your phone is to Google \"root your_phone_name\" and look through the results for an appropriate tutorial."

"This is a SQLite database. You can go ahead and view the database using the built in DB viewer.
However, if you would like to edit the database contents and perform more advanced functions such as record filtering then you could try our new SQLite Editor which is now available from the market."

" The three tabs next to Help contain actions which can be performed on this file.
The Internal tab contains internal Root Explorer functions such as Text Viewer, SQLite Database Viewer and Zip Viewer.
The Generic tab allows you to open the file as a generic type such as Text, Music, Audio or Image.
The Apps tab allows you to select a specific app with which to open the file.
Just click on one of these tabs and select the action you wish to use.
At the bottom of each list is a check box. Make sure this box is ticked if you want to make this the default action for the file type."
You cannot paste here because the file system is read-only.
The selected items cannot be moved because the file system is read-only.
The selected items cannot be deleted because the file system is read-only.

"Root Explorer has not yet managed to obtain root access. Because of issues with Superuser, this often happens the first time the app is run but is usually fine from then on.
Click OK and restart the app to try again. Make sure you respond correctly to the Superuser prompt."

"Root access could not be obtained.
Make sure you granted root permission when requested by SuperUser. If you did then try re-rooting your device.
Root Explorer will continue in non-root mode."

"Root access could not be obtained because su failed with the following message:
"

"
Make sure you granted root permission when requested by SuperUser. If you did then try re-rooting your device.
Root Explorer will continue in non-root mode."
These was a problem displaying the Android Market. Please try again.
SD card is not mounted. Zip operation aborted.
No name entered. Zip not created
SD card is not mounted. Tar operation aborted.
What compression would you like applied to this tar archive?
No name entered. Tar not created
The SD card is not currently mounted
does not exist. Displaying first existing parent folder instead.
There was not enough free disk space to complete the paste operation.

"There was not enough free disk space to complete the paste operation.
Please note that the free space displayed by Root Explorer (as reported by linux) is not always 100% accurate!"

"The link operation failed with the following message:
\""
This may be because the target file system does not support symbolic links. Most SD cards do NOT support links.
The associated app could not open this file.
No application was found capable of opening this type of file.
This file is not readable by non-root apps. Copy to SD card first if you want to select it.
This is a package installer. What action would you like to perform?
This is an executable script file. What action would you like to perform?
Owner/Group change was not successful. Please note that some file systems (e.g. SD card) do not allow owner/group changes.
Permissions change was not successful. Please note that some file systems (e.g. SD card) do not allow permission changes.
You cannot edit this file because the file system is read-only.
cannot be deleted because the file system is read-only.
cannot be renamed because the file system is read-only.
cannot be moved because the file system is read-only.
permissions cannot be changed because the file system is read-only.
owner cannot be changed because the file system is read-only.
Hit \"Go to zip\" to go to that folder or hit \"Stay\" to stay in the current folder.
Hit \"Go to tar\" to go to that folder or hit \"Stay\" to stay in the current folder.
Zip creation failed due to the following error condition:
Tar creation failed due to the following error condition:
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
already exists. Do you want to continue and merge the folder contents?
already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
already exists. What action would you like to take?
No name entered. Item not renamed
You cannot create a new folder here because the file system is read-only.
You cannot create a new file here because the file system is read-only.
No name entered. Folder not created.
No name entered. File not created.
This is a link. Permissions will be changed on the target
This is a link. Owner/Group will be changed on the target
The SD card is not currently mounted. Returning to root folder.
Hit \"Go to extracted\" to go to that folder or hit \"Stay\" to stay in the current folder.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected bookmark?
Preparing to archive....Press Back to cancel
Could not create archive destination folder
This file is too large to display in full so is only partially displayed. Any changes cannot be saved.
This file is too large to display in full so is only partially displayed.
File saved. Original file backed up as
All unsaved changes have been discarded
You have made changes to this file. Do you want to save these changes before exiting?
List is displayed in Simple mode
List is displayed in Detailed mode
Files are sorted by Name in ascending order
Files are sorted by Name in descending order
Files are sorted by Date in ascending order
Files are sorted by Date in descending order
Files are sorted by Size in ascending order
Files are sorted by Size in descending order
Files are sorted by Type in ascending order
Folders are always listed first, followed by the remaining files
Folders are mixed with files according to the selected sort order
Hidden files and folders (starting with a dot) are displayed
Hidden files and folders (starting with a dot) are NOT displayed
Info bar displays used/free disk space
Info bar displays file system name
New zip/tar files will be created in this folder. Current value is
Archive files will be extracted to this folder. Current value is
This folder will displayed when the app starts. Current value is
File sizes are displayed in K, MB or GB where appropriate.
File sizes are displayed in bytes only.
This database is currently locked by another process. Try again in a moment or two.
An error occurred while opening the database.
Too much data returned. Only the first %d records are displayed. The maximum number of records displayed can be changed in settings.
Ran out of memory while loading data. Not all records are displayed.
Always perform the selected action for this type of file
Select the new owner and group and click OK. Click Cancel to leave the owner and group unchanged.
Do this for all existing items
A problem occurred while extracting files from the archive.
